mapper.update: update company set CompanyName = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMail = #{EMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WebAddress = #{webAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `Status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where CompanyID = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CompanyID, CompanyName, Address, Tel, EMail, WebAddress, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status` from company where CompanyID = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select CompanyID, CompanyName, Address, Tel, EMail, WebAddress, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status` from company
